Package net.sbbi.upnp.services

Interface Summary
ServiceStateVariableTypes Interface to defined allowed values for service state variables data types
 

Class Summary
ISO8601Date ISO8601 Date implementation taken from org.w3c package and modified to work with UPNP date types
ServiceAction An object to represent a service action proposed by an UPNP service
ServiceActionArgument An argument for a service action
ServiceStateVariable Class to contain a service state variable definition
UPNPService Representation of an UPNP service
